criteria.text: Application accepts username and prints proper message **+6**
Application exits if user pressed `ctrl+c` or sent `.exit` command and proper message is printed **+10**
Attempts to perform an operation on a non-existent file or work on a non-existent path result in the operation fail **+20**

criteria.title: Navigation & working directory operations implemented properly

criteria.text: Go to dedicated folder from current directory **+10**
List all files and folders in current directory **+10**

criteria.title: Basic operations with files implemented properly

criteria.text: Read file and print it's content in console **+10**
Operating system info (prints following information in console) implemented properly
Get host machine CPUs info (overall amount of CPUS plus model and clock rate (in GHz) for each of them) **+10**
Get current *system user name* (Do not confuse with the username that is set when the application starts) **+6**
Get CPU architecture for which Node.js binary has compiled **+6**
Calculate hash for file Decompress file (using Brotli algorithm) **+20**
All files operations with reading/writing should be performed using Streams API **+50**
Codebase is written in ESM modules instead of CommonJS **+20**
Any external tools/libraries are used **-95% of total task score**
Commits after deadline (except commits that affect only `Readme.md`, `.gitignore`, etc.) **-30% of total task score**
